description:
Converts an element (can be a group) to a PNG, which can then be either accessed and saved or downloaded directly to the user's computer.  

Fixed the common know bug - Not able to export the images inside the group.

If you need anything. Mail me - ankur@nocodetalks.co
name: Screenshot the Group
plugin_instructions:
Steps -

1. Expose the add HTML ID to elements (Settings => General => Enable "Option the option to add an ID attribute to HTML elements"

2. Add the ID to the Group which you want to export as the image. 

3. Drag the element "Element as PNG" to the editor. 

4. Use the workflow "Export Image" 

Thats it..
